title: PROJECT Cores
body: So, I've got all 3 summoner icons from the project cores. I made a second Kat one to see if it did anything special, and it doesn't. I've now seen that 11 = a new project skin. Is it possible to get the 7 I wasted on nothing back?

replies.body:
The event isn't over *just yet!* The second phase starts tomorrow, August 9th, wherein the Disruption Cache is released which should cost 1500 IP and will unlock more project cores + more awesome shiny PROJECT-related content  for you to craft with! 

For complete deets, hit up the [PROJECT: DISRUPTION FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ). Let me know if you have any questions!
but you're saying we get 4 chests for ip and then once again get to sit on a ton of ip and can no longer participate in the event if we are unable/unwilling to spend rp.
